name: Football Cup 2019
description:
Live and breathe the beautiful game recreated with unparalleled realism! In Football Cup 2019, your knowledge of real-world football is an invaluable asset, as players' individual skill levels, playstyles and moves are rendered in-game with meticulous attention to detail.

Choose one of the favourites such as Argentina, Spain or Brazil, or help one of the outsiders achieve the first place!

GAME MODES
Season - Lead your team through the whole season to league glory
Tournament - Become the best in the world and make history
Practice - Improve your skills

Brand new CARRER mode - try to complete dozenes of challenging levels including "Floor is lava", "Wall of death" and others. A fun way to improve your skills and prepare yourself for the real football game.

Take total control of every action on the pitch in a way that only the Football Cup 2019 can provide! Natural Player Movements, Precision Passing and In-Depth Tactics bring the true experience of the beautiful game to your phone!

This app is an offline football game. Enjoy the beautiful game anytime and anywhere!
